characterabilities.name: Alternative History
characterabilities.description: This model is not allowed in competitive play events.

characterabilities.name: Beast Presence
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain +2 to accuracy rolls and gains an additional damage die when making melee attacks against enemy models engaged by this model.

characterabilities.name: Quick Work
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during it's Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved, it can make one basic ranged attack.

characterabilities.name: Side Step
characterabilities.description: When this model hits an enemy model with an initial melee attack or a melee special attack, it can advance up to 2" after the attack is resolved.

characterabilities.name: Unwavering
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be pushed, become knocked down, become stationary, be moved by a slam, and never suffers Blind or Shadow Bind.

feat.name: Brain Meld
feat.description: Friendly Faction warbeasts currently in Bethayne's Control range can immediately make one basic melee attack. After these melee attacks are resolved, friendly Faction warbeasts currently in Bethayne's Control range can immediately make one ranged attack.

execution.name: Meat for the Beast
execution.description: Once during each of your turns when a model in this model's battlegroup destroys an enemy model with a melee attack while in this model's Control range, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can cast a spell without spending focus.

ability.name: Anatomical Precision
ability.description: When this model's melee damage roll fails to exceed the ARM of a living model hit, that model suffers 1 damage point. A model disabled by a melee attack made by this model cannot make a Tough Roll.

spells.name: Absorb Flesh
spells.description: Remove target friendly living warbeasts from play. Bethayne immediately gains 1 fury point and removes d6+1 damage points from herself. Bethayne also reaves the fury from warbeasts targeted by this spell immediately, but cannot go above her ARC stat in fury points. This spell can only be cast once per round.

spells.name: Battle Host
spells.description: Warbeasts in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in it's Control Range gain +2" movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement. The spellcaster gains +2 ARM while one or more warbeasts in it's battlegroup are within 3" of it.

spells.name: Disintegration
spells.description: The model hit suffers -2 ARM for one round. A model boxed by Disintegration is removed from play.

spells.name: Dog Pile
spells.description: Warbeasts in the spellcaster's battlegroup cna charge or make slam power attacks against the target model without being forced. They can ignore forests and cloud effects when determining LOS when declaring a charge or slam attack against the affected model. THey gain +2" movement and Pathfinder when resolving charges or slam power attacks targeting the affected model.

characterabilities.name: Booster Shot (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1. Target friendly Faction warbeast model. If the warbeast is in range, it surfers 1 damage point and all accuracy and damage rolls resulting from its next basic attack this turn are boosted.

characterabilities.name: Maltreatment
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, anytime during your activation phase except while activating another model, this model can remove 1 fury point from a warbeast in its battlegroup that is in its Control Range and add 1 fury point to it's own current total. The warbeast suffers d3 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Cephalyx, Circle, Crucible Guard, and Skorne]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Cephalyx, Circle, Crucible Guard, and Skorne.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Thornfall Alliance]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Thornfall Alliance armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Special Issue [Gorax Ragers and Farrow Warbeasts]
characterabilities.description: Any army that includes this model can also include any number of Gorax Ragers and Farrow Warbeasts in his battlegroup. These models are considered the same faction as Dr. Egan Arkadius.

characterabilities.name: Special Issue [Targ]
characterabilities.description: You may include a Targ solo model in armies that include this model and when included, the model becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

feat.name: Monster Mayhem
feat.description: Warbeasts in Arkadius' battlegroup can immediately frenzy. A model can frenzy even if it has already activated this turn, and it can activate later this turn even if it frenzies as a result of Monster Mayhem. When a warbeast is frenzied as a result of Monster Mayhem, you can choose the warbeast's frenzy target if the target is currently in Arkadius' Control range.

execution.name: Heal [d3+1] (★Action)
execution.description: RNG 1". Target friendly living Faction model. If the model is in range remove d3+1 damage points from it.

ability.name: Needle
ability.description: Instead of suffering a damage roll, a living model hit by this weapon automatically suffers 1 damage point. This weapon cannot damage non-living models.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Anesthesia
subabilities.description: A living model damaged by an attack with this weapon becomes stationary for one round.

subabilities.name: Brain Damage
subabilities.description: A model damaged by an attack with this weapon cannot cast spells for one round.

subabilities.name: Volatile Expansion
subabilities.description: When a living or undead model is boxed by an attack made with this weapon, center a 4˝ AOE on the boxed model and then remove the model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer a POW 14 magical blast damage roll.

spells.name: Crippling Grasp
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 SPD, DEF and ARM, STR.

spells.name: Forced Evolution
spells.description: Target friendly living Faction warbeast gains +2 STR and DEF.

spells.name: Psycho Surgery
spells.description: Each model in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range can immediately remove d3+1 damage points. This spell can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Revive
spells.description: Return one destroyed Grunt to a friendly Faction unit with one unmarked damage box. Place the returned Grunt in the spellcaster's Control Range, in formation, and completely within 3" of another model in its unit. The Grunt must forfeit its Combat Action the turn it is put into play.

spells.name: Sunder Spirit
spells.description: An enemy warbeast damaged by Sunder Spirit loses its animus for one round.

spells.name: Watcher
spells.description: Once per turn when an enemy model advances and ends its movement within 6" of the spellcaster, you can choose a Cohort model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range. That Cohort model can immediately make a full advance toward the enemy model and then can make one basic attack targeting the enemy model.

characterabilities.name: Exhaust Fumes
characterabilities.description: When this model advances during it's Normal Movement, for one round other friendly models gain concealment while within 3" of this model.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Vengeance of Dhunia]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Vengeance of Dhunia armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Wild Ride
characterabilities.description: Light and heavy warbeasts in this model's battlegroup gain Cavalry, Pathfinder and Reposition [3”]. When an affected warbeast makes an impact attack, that attack has a base POW equal to its STR. The melee range of impact attacks is 1”. Affected warbeasts do not gain Mount attacks from Wild Ride.

feat.name: Highway to Hell
feat.description: Helga immediately casts Engine of Destruction without spending fury. Additionally, when a friendly Faction model in Helga's Control range hits one or more enemy models with an attack during its activation, at the end of it's activation the attacking model can make a full advance. The affected model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement. Highway to Hell lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Dodge
execution.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

ability.name: Brain Damage
ability.description: A model damaged by an attack with this weapon cannot cast spells for one round.

ability.name: Pull
ability.description: If this model hits an enemy model with an equal or smaller base with a basic attack with this weapon, after the attack is resolved the hit model can be pushed directly toward this model until it contacts a model, an obstacle, or an obstruction.

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

ability.name: Grinding Wheel
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die on accuracy rolls against small- and medium-based models.

spells.name: Battering Ram
spells.description: An enemy model hit by Battering Ram can be pushed 3" directly away from the spell's point of Origin.

spells.name: Battle Host
spells.description: Warbeasts in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in it's Control Range gain +2" movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement. The spellcaster gains +2 ARM while one or more warbeasts in it's battlegroup are within 3" of it.

spells.name: Engine of Destruction
spells.description: The Spellcaster gains +2 SPD, +4 MAT and +4 to melee attack damage rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Primed
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 to melee accuracy and damage rolls but suffers -2 ARM. If an affected model is disabled by an enemy attack, center a 3” AOE on it and remove that model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 14 blast damage roll.

spells.name: Rapport
spells.description: Target warbeast in the spellcaster's battlegroup can use the spellcaster's current MAT and RAT in place of its own. When checking to see if the affected warbeast is in its controller's Control Range, double the range.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Gang Fighter]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Gang Fighter. (A model with Gang Fighter gains +2 to melee attack accuracy and melee damage rolls when making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in the melee range of another friendly Faction warrior model.)

characterabilities.name: Flank [Friendly Faction Cohort]
characterabilities.description: When this model makes a melee attack against an enemy model in the melee range of a friendly Friendly Faction Cohort model, this model gains +2 to attack rolls and gains an additional damage die.

characterabilities.name: Gang Fighter
characterabilities.description: When making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in the melee range of another friendly Faction warrior model, this model gains +2 to melee attack accuracy and melee damage rolls.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Vengeance of Dhunia]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Vengeance of Dhunia armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Set Defense
characterabilities.description: A model in this model's front arc suffers -2 on charge, slam power attack, and impact attack accuracy rolls against this model.

characterabilities.name: Veteran Leader [Farrow Valkyries]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, Farrow Valkyries models gain +1 to attack accuracy rolls.

feat.name: Grand Finale
feat.description: Friendly Faction models currently in this model's Control range gain Pitch on their range weapons. When a friendly Faction model in Helga's Control range hits an enemy model with a basic melee attack, instead of making a normal damage roll, the enemy model can be slammed d6” directly away from the attacking model. The POW of the slam damage roll is equal to the P+S of the Attack. The POW of collateral damage rolls is equal to the STR of the attacking model. Grand Finale lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Groundwork
execution.description: While knocked down, this model is not automatically hit by melee attacks and its DEF is not reduced by being knocked down.

ability.name: Inflict Pain
ability.description: When this weapon hits a warbeast, this model can place 1 fury point on or remove 1 fury point from the hit warbeast.

spells.name: Cyclone
spells.description: The spellcaster immediately makes a full advance, ignoring freestrikes during this movement. At the end of this movement, the spellcaster can make one basic melee attack against each model in its LOS that is in its melee range. Cyclone can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Dash
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction warrior models activating in its Control Range gain +1 SPD. While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly Faction warrior models gain Unstoppable. Dash lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Defender's Ward
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 DEF and ARM. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Distraction
spells.description: Target warrior model/unit cannot make ranged attacks and suffer -2 DEF and MAT for one round.

spells.name: Muzzle
spells.description: An enemy warbeast damaged by Muzzle cannot advance toward the spellcaster for one round.

characterabilities.name: En Garde
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, friendly Faction warrior models gain Riposte.

characterabilities.name: Henchmen [Farrow]
characterabilities.description: Choose one friendly Farrow unit at the beginning of the game to be Henchmen. The chosen unit gains +2 DEF and can reroll its missed accuracy rolls. Each accuracy roll can be rerolled only one as a result of Henchmen.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Vegeance of Dhunia]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Vegeance of Dhunia armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Riposte
characterabilities.description: When this model is missed by an enemy melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one basic melee attack against the attacking model.

feat.name: Most Noted Highwaymen
feat.description: While in Azazello's Control range, friendly Faction warrior models gain +2 STR and DEF and Duelist. Most Noted Highwaymen lasts for one round. (a model with Duelist gains +2 DEF against melee accuracy rolls.)

execution.name: Reversal
execution.description: When a model misses this model with a charge or power attack, the attacking model becomes knocked down.

ability.name: Beacon
ability.description: Friendly Faction models can charge or make a slam power attack against an enemy model hit by a weapon with Beacon without being forced or spending focus. A friendly Faction model charging an enemy model hit by Beacon gains +2" movement. Beacon lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Flashing Blade
spells.description: The spellcaster immediately makes one basic attack with one of its melee weapons against each enemy model in its LOS that is in the weapon's melee range. These attacks are simultaneous.

spells.name: Phantasm
spells.description: When target friendly Faction model/unit is targeted by a ranged attack with a RNG greater than 8”, the attack suffers -5 RNG to a minimum of 8”. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Storm Rager
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model gains +2 STR, MAT and ARM and cannot be targeted by combined ranged attacks or combined melee attacks.

spells.name: Wind Rush
spells.description: The spellcaster can immediately make a full advance and gains +2 DEF for one round. Wind Rush can be cast only once per activation.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Hyper-Aggressive]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Hyper-Aggressive. (When a model with Hyper-Aggressive suffers damage from an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make a full advance directly toward the attacking model.)

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Vengeance of Dhunia]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Vengeance of Dhunia armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Reckless Arcana
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, when a model in this model's battlegroup destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved, this model can cast a spell with a COST 3 or less without spending focus, fury, or essence.

characterabilities.name: Stuff More Powder (★Action)
characterabilities.description: Target friendly faction warrior model/unit gain +2 to their next range damage roll this turn.

characterabilities.name: Veteran Leader [Farrow Warrior]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, Farrow Warrior models gain +1 to attack accuracy rolls.

feat.name: Hog Heaven
feat.description: While in Carver's Control range, friendly Faction models gain Overtake and an additional die on melee damage rolls. Hog Heaven lasts for one turn. (When a model with Overtake destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, after the attack is resolved it can immediately advance up to 1”.)

execution.name: Animal Farm
execution.description: This model gains an additional die on accuracy and damage rolls against Humans.

ability.name: Both Barrels (★Attack)
ability.description: This model gains +4 to the damage roll for this attack. This model cannot make additional ranged attacks with this weapon during an activation in which it makes a Both Barrels Attack.

spells.name: Batten Down the Hatches
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control range, models in its battlegroup cannot become knocked down and gain +3 ARM but suffer -2 DEF. Batten Down the Hatches lasts for one round.

spells.name: Bombshell
spells.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Models thrown do not deviate. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a POW 10 damage roll. The POW of collateral damage is 10.

spells.name: Mobility
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range gain +2 SPD and Pathfinder for one turn.

spells.name: Quagmire
spells.description: While engaged with target friendly Faction model/unit, enemy models suffer -2 DEF and cannot advance except to change facing.

characterabilities.name: Body Horrors
characterabilities.description: This model can channel spells through friendly undead models in this model's Control range.

characterabilities.name: Bring the Bodies Here!
characterabilities.description: A model with this rule can collect corpse tokens from any non-construct models that it or a friendly faction Cohort destroyed with a melee attack while in this model's Control range, and it can carry an unlimited amount at a time. After this model leeches fury during your next Control Phase, replace each corpse token with 1 fury point.

characterabilities.name: Curse [Bone Grinder]
characterabilities.description: This model can use Curse once per activation at any time. Choose an enemy model/unit in this model's CMD range. Friendly Bone Grinder models gain +2 to attack accuracy rolls against the chosen model/unit. Curse lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Dismember
characterabilities.description: When this model hits a warbeast with a melee attack, it gains an additional die to the attack damage roll.

characterabilities.name: Special Issue [Boneswarm]
characterabilities.description: During list construction, you can include Boneswarm light warbeasts in this model's battlegroup, if you do, they gain [Farrow] keywords and are considered to be Farrow light warbeasts.

feat.name: Pet Cemetary
feat.description: Midas spends any number of fury points when this feat is used. Return each destroyed warbeast from Midas' battlegroup that was destroyed this game to play, placing them completely within 6” of Midas with one unmarked damage box in each aspect. For each fury point spent, remove 1 damage point from each model in Midas' battlegroup that is in his Control range. Returned warbeasts gain Undead. Returned warbeasts cannot be forced this turn. Warbeasts that were destroyed this turn cannot be returned.

execution.name: Finisher
execution.description: This model gains an additional die on damage rolls against damaged models.

spells.name: Abattoir
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range can immediately make one basic melee attack. Abattoir can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Disintegration
spells.description: The model hit suffers -2 ARM for one round. A model boxed by Disintegration is removed from play.

spells.name: Fresh Bodies
spells.description: Friendly Faction models in this model's Control range gain +2 ARM. When a friendly model is destroyed in this model's Control range from an enemy effect, the spellcaster gains that model's corpse token.

spells.name: Fury
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +3 to melee damage rolls but suffers -1 DEF.

spells.name: Hex Blast
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Shield Guard]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Shield Guard. (When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have the model with Shield Guard directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.)

characterabilities.name: Struggle of Wills
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game and at the start of each of your Maintenance Phases after your first turn, choose which mind is dominant: Sturm or Drang. Use that mind's stats and rules for one round.

feat.name: Psychic Apocalypse
feat.description: You may immediately switch which mind is dominant, Strum or Drang. Enemy warbeasts currently in Sturm & Drang's Control range have their base FURY reduced to 1. Enemy Warjacks and Monstrosities currently in Sturm & Drang's Control range cannot be allocated focus. Horrors cannot be summoned in Sturn & Drang's Control range. While in Sturm & Drang's Control range, enemy models cannot be used to channel spells. Psychic Apocalypse lasts for one round.

execution.name: Hyper-Regeneration
execution.description: Remove d3 damage points from this model at the start of each of it's activations.

spells.name: Deceleration
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly faction models gain +2 ARM against ranged and magic attack damage rolls. Deceleration lasts for one round.

spells.name: Polarity Shield
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Polarity Field. Models are not affected while out of formation. (A model with Polarity Field cannot be charged or slam power attacked by a model beginning the charge or slam in its front arc.).

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.description: Warp target model completely within 2" of its current location. When Telekinesis targets an enemy model, it is an offensive spell and requires a magic attack roll. A model can be warped by telekinesis only once per turn.

spells.name: Vision
spells.description: When target friendly Faction model is directly hit by an attack, you can choose to have it suffer no damage roll from the attack, then Vision expires.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Overtake]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Overtake. (When a model with Overtake destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, after the attack is resolved it can immediately advance up to 1".)

characterabilities.description: While in this model's Control Range, living warbeasts in its battlegroup gain +2 on melee accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.description: Choose one enemy model or unit with ambush that has not yet been put into play. Its controller must immediately deploy the chosen model or unit. This ability can only be used once per game.

A model with Prey gains +2 to attack and damage rolls against its prey. When the prey is destroyed or removed from play, choose another model/unit to be the prey.)

characterabilities.description: Models in this unit gain Take Down. (Models disabled by a melee attack made by a model with Take Down cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by a melee attack made by this model are removed from play.)

ability.name: Batter
ability.description: When an enemy model is hit by this weapon during this model's activation, it becomes knocked down and can be pushed 1” directly away from this model. If the model hit is pushed, this model can immediately advance 1” directly toward it.

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

topability.name: Fell Calls
topability.description: This model can make one of the following calls at any time during its activation. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one call each turn.

subabilities.name: Cacophony
subabilities.description: While in this model's command range, enemy models/units cannot cast spells or be used to channel spells. Cacophony lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Call of Defiance
subabilities.description: While in formation, models in this unit do not lose Tough while knocked down. Call of Defiance lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Reveille
subabilities.description: Knocked down friendly Faction models in this model's CMD range immediately stand up. Models that became knocked down this turn are not affected by Reveille.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Support
characterabilities.description: While this model is in its warcaster/warlock's Control range, the warcaster/warlock can upkeep one spell without spending focus/fury.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it. The attached model is part of its Leader's Battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Battle Wizard
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, when this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one Magic ability special attack or special action.

topability.name: Magic Ability
topability.description: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

subabilities.name: Marionette (★Attack)
subabilities.description: Marionette is a RNG 10 arcane attack. Target enemy model/unit. You can have one afffected model reroll one accuracy or damage roll, then Marionette expires. Marionette lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Puppet Master (★Action) (★Attack)
subabilities.description: Puppet Master is a RNG 10 spell. When it targets an enemy model/unit, it is a magic attack. You can have one affected model reroll one accuracy or damage roll, then Puppet Master expires. Puppet Master lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Spell Slave (★Action) (★Attack)
subabilities.description: This model must be in it's warcaster's Control Range to make the Spell Slave special action. When it does, it casts one of the spells on it's warcaster's card with a COST of 3 or less. This model cannot cast upkeep spells or spells with a RNG of SELF or CTRL. When casting an offensive spell, Spell Slave in a magic attack. Use this model's Magic Ability score when making magic accuracy rolls.

ability.name: Critical Consume
ability.description: On a critical hit, if the attack hits a small-based non-Leader model the model hit is removed from play.

ability.name: Dispel
ability.description: When this weapon hits a model/unit, upkeep spells and animi on that model/unit immediately expire.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it. The attached model is part of its Leader's Battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Intrigue (★Attack)
characterabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target enemy warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it loses Stealth for one round.

characterabilities.name: Seduction (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 3 - Take Control of a living enemy non-leader warrior model. If the model is in range you can immediately make a full advance with the enemy model followed by a basic melee attack, then Seduction expires. The enemy model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement. A model can be affected by Seduction only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Sucker!
characterabilities.description: If this model is directly hit by an enemy ranged attack, choose a friendly non-incorporeal warrior model within 3" of it to be directly hit instead. That model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it. The attached model is part of its Leader's Battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Dodge
characterabilities.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

subabilities.name: Lucky Charm (★Action)
subabilities.description: During its activation this turn, this model's warcaster can reroll one attack or damage roll, then Lucky Charm expires.

subabilities.name: Reloader (★Action)
subabilities.description: During its Combat Action this turn, this model's warcaster can make one additional ranged attack.

subabilities.name: Spyglass (★Action)
subabilities.description: Target an enemy model in this model's LOS. That model loses stealth for one round.

characterabilities.name: Auto-Repair
characterabilities.description: During your Control Phase, remove d3 damage points from this model.

characterabilities.name: Evasive
characterabilities.description: When this model is hit by an enemy ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can advance up to 2".

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Gun Platform
characterabilities.description: This model can make ranged attacks even while in melee and can target models outside of melee.

characterabilities.name: Bottom Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [any army]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for any army.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The upper level of this structure is considered to be elevated terrain. Additionally, models on the Top Floor gain Snipe. Spells cast from the Top Floor gain +4 RNG.
